IneligibleSkip.eligiblityText: This section does not apply to your offense.
IneligibleSkip.helperText: Please hit start and choose another option.

eligibleDOa.eligiblityText: You may be eligible to file to seal the records of this arrest and may be able to file at any time.
eligibleDOa.helperText: PDS or another lawyer will be able to advise you about whether your alleged conduct is now decriminalized or legalized

eligibleDOb.eligiblityText: If in this particular arrest, you were only arrested for a marijuana-related offense and only charged with a marijuana-related offense, then you may be eligible to file to seal the records of this arrest. Â  PDS or another lawyer will be able to advise you about whether your alleged conduct is now decriminalized or legalized.
eligibleDOb.helperText: PDS or another lawyer will be able to advise you about whether your alleged conduct is now decriminalized or legalized.

0.questionText: Were you arrested, charged or convicted of a marijuana-related offense before February 26, 2015.
helperText:
A marijuana-related offense involves marijuana and any of the following:  
 possession of a controlled substance, 
 possession of drug paraphernalia, 
 possession with the intent to distribute a controlled substance, 
 distribution of a controlled substance, OR  
 an attempt or a conspiracy to commit any of the offenses any of the above.

1.questionText: When you were arrested for, charged with or convicted of a marijuana-related offense, were you ALSO arrested for, charged with or convicted of violating any NON-marijuana related offense or violation of the D.C. Code, the D.C. Municipal Regulations, or the U.S. Code?
